(I'd like to stay on Cybertron for a long time.  That would be fun.  But 
people would need to make a lot of descisions on how it would work.  But like 
I said before, we could go to any plane from their on.  Also, mixing 
Transformers with Animorphs wouldn't be a good idea.  It would be fun 
probably, but Transformers would kick their arses easy.  Oh, Andalite's have 
tailblades.  Heh, let's see how well they do against several feet thick of 
Cybertronian armor and a big laser rifle.)
